original_text: So it was their children, whom he raised up in their place, that Joshua circumcised. For they were uncircumcised, because they had not been circumcised on the way.
korean_text: 그들의 대를 잇게 하신 이 자손에게 여호수아가 할례를 행하였으니 길에서는 그들에게 할례를 행하지 못하였으므로 할례 없는 자가 되었음이었더라

sentences.original_text: whom he raised up in their place
because they had not been circumcised on the way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 길에서 할례를 받지 않았기 때문입니다
